name: Domane SLR 9

brand.name: Trek
brand.description: American bicycle and cycling product manufacturer.

description: The Domane SLR 9 is Trek's flagship endurance road bike, featuring IsoSpeed decouplers for superior comfort on long rides. Built with OCLV 800 carbon, it's incredibly light yet maintains excellent compliance over rough roads.

name: Stumpjumper Expert

brand.name: Specialized
brand.description: Specialized Bicycle Components is an American company designing and manufacturing bicycles and related products.

description: The Stumpjumper Expert is a legendary trail bike that delivers exceptional performance on technical terrain. With 140mm of travel and a FACT 11m carbon frame, it's built to conquer any mountain.

name: TCR Advanced Pro

brand.name: Giant
brand.description: Giant Manufacturing is a Taiwanese bicycle manufacturer and one of the world's largest.

description: The TCR Advanced Pro is Giant's race-ready machine, designed for speed and efficiency. Its Advanced-Grade Composite frame delivers unmatched stiffness-to-weight ratio for explosive acceleration.

name: SuperSix EVO

brand.name: Cannondale
brand.description: Cannondale is an American brand of premium bicycles known for innovation in materials and design.

description: The SuperSix EVO combines race-winning performance with all-day comfort. Its BallisTec carbon construction creates an incredibly light frame that excels in both climbs and sprints.

name: Spark RC

brand.name: Scott
brand.description: Scott Sports is a Swiss company producing bicycles, winter equipment and motorsports gear.

description: The Spark RC is Scott's ultimate XC race weapon, featuring the innovative TwinLoc system for instant suspension adjustment. Built for World Cup victories, it's the choice of professional riders worldwide.

name: P5 Disc

brand.name: Cervélo
brand.description: Cervélo is a Canadian manufacturer focused on high-performance road and triathlon bikes.

description: The P5 Disc is Cervélo's most advanced triathlon bike, engineered in their own wind tunnel for maximum aerodynamic efficiency. Every detail is optimized for speed over long distances.

name: Oltre RC

brand.name: Bianchi
brand.description: Bianchi is an iconic Italian bicycle manufacturer known for its Celeste color and racing heritage.

description: The Oltre RC represents Bianchi's commitment to Italian craftsmanship and innovation. Its distinctive Celeste color and cutting-edge aerodynamics make it both beautiful and fast.

name: Grail CF SLX

brand.name: Canyon
brand.description: Canyon Bicycles is a German direct-to-consumer bicycle company known for performance road and gravel bikes.

description: The Grail CF SLX revolutionizes gravel riding with its unique double-decker handlebar design. Built for comfort and control on unpaved roads, it's the ultimate adventure machine.

name: FX Sport Carbon

brand.name: Trek
brand.description: American bicycle and cycling product manufacturer.

description: The FX Sport Carbon blends fitness-focused performance with urban practicality. Its IsoSpeed decoupler provides comfort for daily commutes while maintaining efficiency for longer rides.

name: Sirrus X 5.0

brand.name: Specialized
brand.description: Specialized Bicycle Components is an American company designing and manufacturing bicycles and related products.

description: The Sirrus X 5.0 is designed for riders who want to explore beyond pavement. With wider tires and a more relaxed geometry, it handles city streets and light trails with ease.

name: Speedmax CF SLX

brand.name: Canyon
brand.description: Canyon Bicycles is a German direct-to-consumer bicycle company known for performance road and gravel bikes.

description: The Speedmax CF SLX is Canyon's ultimate time trial machine, designed with input from professional triathletes. Its aggressive geometry and aero profile deliver maximum speed.

name: Epic World Cup

brand.name: Specialized
brand.description: Specialized Bicycle Components is an American company designing and manufacturing bicycles and related products.

description: The Epic World Cup is Specialized's ultimate cross-country race bike, featuring the Brain 2.0 suspension for automatic lockout. It's the weapon of choice for World Cup champions.
